context.original_query: Query 1: What's the latest between India and France?

memory.original_query: Query 1: What's the latest between India and France?
memory.summary_output:
The latest developments between India and France include discussions from a bilateral meeting held on January 26th, focusing on several key areas of cooperation:

- **Cooperation in the Southwest Indian Ocean:** Both countries agreed to intensify cooperation, building on previous joint surveillance missions to enhance the securitization of strategic sea lanes of communication. [https://www.drishtiias.com/daily-updates/daily-news-analysis/india-france-relations-1](https://www.drishtiias.com/daily-updates/daily-news-analysis/india-france-relations-1)
- **Indo-Pacific Partnership:** Both sides emphasized the significance of the Indo-Pacific Region and committed to deepening their partnership based on a common vision. [https://www.drishtiias.com/daily-updates/daily-news-analysis/india-france-relations-1](https://www.drishtiias.com/daily-updates/daily-news-analysis/india-france-relations-1)
- **Defence and Security Partnership:** The defense and security partnership in the Indo-Pacific region was highlighted as a cornerstone of their collaboration, including joint tri-services exercises and increasing capacities in the maritime domain. [https://www.drishtiias.com/daily-updates/daily-news-analysis/india-france-relations-1](https://www.drishtiias.com/daily-updates/daily-news-analysis/india-france-relations-1)
